name: The Legend of Zelda: The Hunter's Song
description:
“Old Man Link” is paid a visit by an old acquaintance but what’s precipitated this visit?

Why, another adventure of course… But why indeed?

Featuring the following changes to A Link to the Past:

New Sprites
Three New Dungeons
A White Beard
A cute little Minish garbed in full armor
Picasso’s Peace Dove
A Buzzing Hero
A Capra Hircus

and so much more…

Take courage. Experience “Link” with a voice(gasp), stripped of sword and youth(double gasp). Rely on wisdom(or save state(no you’re better than that(but it’s so convenient(fair enough)))) to not soft lock the game from that bomb puzzle(triple gasp to admit the game’s broken so brazenly).

name: Astra: Era of Anguish
description: Astra: Era of Anguish is an RPG prequel set in the GOR3 universe. Explore the valley of Laywind and unravel a grand mystery.

name: Penguin Origins
description: Penguin Origins strives to deliver an experience reminiscent of the original game, based on when it started nearly 20 years ago. Enjoy the original looks and feels of how it started, with some remixed elements!

name: Sterling Shroud
description: Sterling Shroud is a point-and-click atmospheric horror game with a focus on navigation and puzzle solving. Can you escape the forest alive?

name: Götz
description:
Goetz is a challenging game. But if you have a soft spot for planning ahead and making your units help each other to create a choreography that will bring the enemies to their knees, Goetz is for you.

Each solved mission is accompanied by a rewarding narrative piece, lovingly illustrated and fully voiced by a cast of over 12 voice-over artists. These not only seamlessly tie into the gameplay, but will draw you into a captivating story of friendship and intrigue that never takes itself too seriously.

name: FleshBound
description: FleshBound is a fast paced and blood pumping demon-slaying speed running first person action platformer with a unique “splatterpunk” aesthetic. Fight, jump and sprint your way through the levels using your hookshot and wall-running skills.

name: The Memories That Shape Us
description: The Memories That Shape Us is a first-person, walking-simulator, narrative video game. Find the Memory Capsules to uncover the story of a person’s life from childhood to adulthood, all the joys, all the struggles, and all the lessons.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Madrid
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Madrid landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Miami
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Miami landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Rome
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Rome landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Singapore
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Singapore landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Gangs of Neo Tokyo
description: Dominate the streets of Neo Tokyo in this high-speed motorbike brawler. Inspired by classic cyberpunk anime and retro road combat games, fight rival gangs and claim the neon-lit highways as your own.

name: Boomerang Of Destruction
description: Sin descripción

name: The Promise of Forever 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Only Up: Lizards Must Fall
description: Only Up: Lizards Must Fall is an incredible multiplayer parkour game where precision and speed are important. Jump and climb over various obstacles. Defeat the cursed Lizards. The slightest mistake can result in falling to the starting location and your Rus brothers will stop respecting you.

name: Vault
description: Uncover the story of a mysterious island through the lens of a primitive drone as you search for the artifact concealed within it, and avoid the guardian of the island.

name: Beyond Citadel
description: Beyond Citadel is an anime style retro throwback shooter inspired by the classics of the 90's, with realistic gunplay mechanics, anime violence and fast paced combat. Fight your way through the heavily armed mechanical fortress and discover the secret that lies beneath.

name: Bricks Survivors
description: Bricks Survivors combine le charme des casse-briques rétro avec l'intensité des roguelites modernes. Survivez à des vagues de briques rapides et affrontez des boss en pixel art, le tout conçu par un seul créateur. Une expérience unique et addictive, disponible exclusivement sur PC.

name: Adventure Allies
description: This is a casual action-adventure game where you adventure with monsters on an unknown island and enjoy combat, exploration, and training. Work together with your fellow monsters to escape from the island before the terrifying night arrives.

name: The King Cat Clicker
description: In this game, you accumulate an absurd amount of coins and help the King of Cats to renovate his kingdom to earn even more coins.

name: Paw Pirates
description: Paw Pirates is a 2v2 party game with cute critters! Tackle, Dodge and Blow Up your friends as you compete to take out their pirate ship! Choose team Cat or team Dog to plunder across a multitude of levels!

name: Knowledge Domination
description: Knowledge Domination is a multiplayer knowledge and strategy game. Players attempt to conquer each other's territories by answering questions correctly. Gain special powers by rolling dice and catch your opponents off guard . If you lose your capital ️, you lose the game.

name: YiShi
description: A squad-based game where the player takes the role of a healer in a Whac-A-Mole attempt to keep the squad alive through healing, enchantment, and offensive spells to vanquish hordes of green skins.

name: Multiverse Loot Hunter
description: This is a brush treasure adventure game across the heavens. The protagonist awakens his powers and freely passes through different planes such as Xiuxian, history, Wuxia, magic, and future. Collect equipment, spirits, characters and cheats distributed across all planes through battle.

name: OMG Words
description: Bringing roguelike mechanics to classic word games. Use relics to create powerful combos, play boons to craft you tiles and board, use your powers to defeat a host of tricky opponents.

name: Subterror
description: At the bottom of the ocean floor lie The Biospheres. These weather-controlled domes once supported vast arrays of lifeforms, but have since been abandoned. Explore arid deserts, dark forests, and frozen tundras. But don't stay too late, as you are not alone out in the great abyss.

name: Paranormal Home Invaders
description: Turn the undead restless as you recklessly disturb their place of rest. Invite yourself and your friends into the homes of scary ghouls is hope that you can return safely and earn your minimum wage ghost hunting reward to feed your loved ones.

name: Lang Ops: Greek
description: The road to efficiency leads through repetition. Lang Ops allows you to get accustomed to Greek language at your own pace! Features a lot of different tests to guarantee success!

name: Future Breach 64
description: Breach and Clear areas tactically in a team-based shooter.

name: Hunt or Hunted Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Heart of the Dice Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Adventure 5-in-1 Bundle
description: Wonderful trip around Europe through amazing touristic locations in more than 30 countries.

name: I Love Finding 9-in-1 Bundle
description: Amazing 9 hidden object games bundle!

name: Mystery Box 4-in-1 Bundle
description: Mind bending puzzle games bundle!

name: 5 Dice
description: 5 Dice is a more challenging and precise puzzle platformer. You have 5 "moves" per screen that consist of; dashing, wall bouncing, placing platforms, etc. Use your moves wisely and precisely in order to reach the end!

name: Precept
description: Precept is a first-person psychedelic action horror game with a heavy focus on exploration. Players take control of a night guard whose purpose is to finish his daily task. The player must find way to escape and survive from mysterious company's environment and entities.

name: Dungeon Raze
description: Here’s a fast-paced dungeon destruction shooter you can clear in as little as 30 minutes! Break walls for shortcuts, detours, or direct paths. Double ammo, halve reload time, and power up to smash through even the toughest walls!

name: Jumpo World
description: Run, jump & hide! get as far as possible in the bizarre world of jumpo world. you only have one life, make it count.

name: Make Good Choices
description: You’re just trying to get home. It’s only a quarter mile. One street. What could go wrong.

name: Paws & Perils: Out Of This World
description: The world of Terranimalium was a peaceful and diverse world filled with biomes and animals of every kind… No wander the aliens would want to take it- But you and your friends aren’t going to let that happen!

name: In This House
description: In This House is a horror-adventure video game for Nintendo Game Boy, Analogue Pocket and PC. It uses timeless four-color 8-bit graphics to tell a universal story about the struggle for one's identity within a family.

name: Bulletfest
description: Sin descripción

name: Wuthering Waves: All Silent Souls Can Sing
description:
Version 2.0 of Wuthering Waves is the game's first major post-release update, and it includes:
• New characters: Carlotta and Roccia
• New region: Rinascita, with several new areas
• New story quests: Prologue - Through the Sea Thou Break
• New exploration systems
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Burger Shop Simulator 2024
description: This is a game developed in Japan where you can freely create hamburgers. You can use your bike to deliver burgers to your customers with a unique delivery system

name: Gun Reflex VR
description: Realistic VR shooter game where you try to complete all the floors by killing your enemies with limited ammunition. It also features zombie, shooting range, and weapon carnival modes.

name: Wonderland X: Next Dream
description: Wonderland X：Next Dream is a 3D fantasy MMO client game. It is an immersive map created with great ingenuity. You can challenge countless rare and exotic beasts and create a world that belongs only to you. Dream.

name: Jigsaw Swimsuit
description: Jigsaw Puzzle with illustrations of pretty Gals! The most puzzles have more than 20 pieces. Can you assemble back?

name: Sokomonster
description: Unleash chaos, strategize destruction, and conquer the city - monster style!

name: The Faceless Killer
description: The Faceless Killer is a first-person survival horror game with retro PS1-style graphics, consisting of 3 chapters. Solve logic puzzles, fight against your enemies, or hide when there's no other option. Unravel this mystery surrounding the Faceless Killer. Who is he, and what are his motivations?

name: Scales of Justice
description: Travel across a magical kingdom with four eccentric individuals! Will you find your destiny—or will you write it for yourself?

name: Sexy Ladies
description: Sexy Ladies is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: PongBreak
description: Clean up the scattered programmable matter in a fun and challenging tennis like format. Multiple control schemes allow for casual or precise gameplay.

name: Incremental Epic Hero 2
description: A mixture of incremental/idle and roleplaying game set in fantasy world filled with monsters and things to explore, where battling is constant, almost everything can be upgraded, and with wide array of various prestige mechanics to always keep things interesting and moving forward!

name: X-Bundle: Windows and Xbox games bundle
description: A bundle of various games published by Xitilon, for Xbox and Windows.

name: Bloodpath
description: An intense and challenging shooter with slow mo and lots of blood, inspired mainly by SUPERHOT and Hotline Miami

name: Maze of Mayhem
description:
-Your mission is clear: explore, survive, and escape.
Collect scattered keys hidden within the maze.
Outsmart a relentless creature stalking the maze, hunting you in the shadows.
Hide to survive, hide in the corner, and wait until it's out of your sight.
Find the exit and escape the nightmare before it’s too late.
Can you navigate the maze's twists and turns, or will you become a permanent part of its deadly legend?

name: Escape from Irene
description: Escape from Irene is a psychological thriller where you wake up in a mysterious place, with no memory, under the watchful eye of Irene. Explore the house, uncover its secrets, and try to escape without alerting Irene—because if she catches on, something terrible will happen.

name: Inside Intruder
description: Inside Intruder - is a psychological horror game that mostly focuses on atmosphere. Game takes place in your own home, where a uninvited guest comes in.

name: Musume
description:
The word "娘 (musume)" primarily means the following:

One's Daughter

A parent uses "musume" to refer to their female child.

Musume is a short dating game.

Get to know the daughter through her father, Itaru.

You can also flirt with her dad

Enjoy the game!

name: Anime Girls: Natty New Year
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Snooker Fever
description: The classic pool experience, right at home!

name: Ignisia
description: Immerse yourself in an exciting journey, explore the vast expanses of Ignisia, where magic, adventure, and powerful enemies await you. Discover an amazing world, uncover ancient secrets, and unite with friends to protect it from the looming threat. Perhaps in the future, you’ll find discoveries you never even imagined…

name: Arcade Archives: Castle of Dragon
description: Go forth, with the power of love!

name: The Apartment 57
description: The Apartment 57 is a psychological horror game set in an abandoned hotel. Players explore dark hallways and uncover dark secrets. The game features immersive storytelling, classic horror elements, and a growing horror atmosphere, inspired by games like Fears to Fathom.

name: The Conundrum Collection
description:
The Conundrum Collection is a browser-based Choose Your Own Adventure series of two short stories offering multiple endings and branching pathways based on the decisions of the reader.

Grimm - Neil Burkman is forced to confront the outcomes of past actions that led him to a seemingly fatal end. He's given a chance to alter this unfavorable outcome. But at what cost?

Hoodie Seize'N - Ella Gray lives in the slums of Proctor City. An area where kidnappings involving young women is at an all time high. After a close friend's disappearance, Ella dives into the hidden criminal underworld in an attempt to rescue her friend before it's too late.

name: cr4nkup
description: Cr4nkup is a cycling program that combines real training and elements from the gaming world in a huge virtual world. Train online with your friends from all over the world and compete in various competitions.

name: Everything Ends In 0
description: The world ends in 1 hour. It can't be saved. Wanna chat?

name: Fitness Fables
description: A fantasy world where fitness becomes an adventure. Fitness Fables turns your workouts into story-driven quests, combining fun challenges with beautiful, immersive environments.

name: Can We Still Get High
description: Embark on an exciting journey with your friends or on your own! To reach the top, you'll have to solve challenging puzzles, overcome dangerous obstacles, and coordinate with each other. Laser communication is both a blessing and a challenge!

name: Mega Man New Menace
description: It's a Mega Man fan game!

name: Sacred Dark
description:
Enfys always loved horror...
Now it's mutual...

name: Outter Carrier
description: A short and weird RPG Maker game about delivering an important package in an inhabitable crumbling building.

name: Termite Man
description: Termite Man is an metroidvania style platformer. Almost every asset is made by hand with love.

name: Lost
description: You are lost in the backrooms, find your way out.

name: Minesweeper But the First Tile is Always a Mine
description: Minesweeper but the first tile is always a mine.

name: Slivania
description: Slivania is a short-form 3D platforming metroidvania, made in under a week for the 32-Bit Winter 2024 Jam!

name: Murder Malady
description: The 20th game in the Carol Reed series. A point and click detective story made by real photographs.

name: The Cleaning Game
description: As a cleaning machine, tend to the custodial duties of an office while trying to avoid human scrutiny and existential dread. Listen to the computers around you, while there is still time. If you are brave enough, investigate your origin and inherent meaning as an electronic in a human world.

name: Genshin Impact: Incandescent Ode of Resurrection
description:
Version 5.3 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Mavuika, Citlali, Lan Yan, and the Pyro version of the Traveler
• New outfits for Hu Tao and Xiangling
• New main story quest: Archon Quest, Chapter V - Act V "Incandescent Ode of Resurrection"
• New Tribal Chronicles quest for the Masters of the Night-Wind, and new story quest for Mavuika
• New permanent game mode: Repertoire of Myriad Melodies
• New main event: Springtime Charms
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Schoolteacher Simulator
description: Become a teacher in a local school. Teach kids, but make sure that your students stay focused during the lesson and react if they misbehave. Each day has unique events. Living school environment with each teacher and student having their own personality.

name: The Nine Rebirths
description: This is a 2D platform decryption adventure game about a cat rescuing its owner. The underworld is full of organs and challenges, can you use the cat's connection between "soul" and "body" to complete this adventure full of dangers and difficulties? Download and play "Back to Life Nine Lives"!

name: Military Defense
description: Protect the base from an alien invasion. Place cannons and destroy the invaders. Upgrade cannons to resist the enemies.

name: City Heist
description: A thief steals diamonds from the bank and tries to escape from the security guards and get the highest score.

name: Dino Dash
description: We get caught collecting a dinosaur's eggs and it's trying not to get caught.

name: Tchunk
description: A calming open world adventure where you play as a wiener dog to discover who and where you are.

name: The Legend of Cyber Cowboy
description: Liberate a town from gangs of cybernetic bandits! The Legend of Cyber Cowboy is a top-down twin-stick shooter presented in slick pixel art style.

name: Pikmin 2 WorldWide
description: Sin descripción

name: The Patchmaker's Workshop
description: Sin descripción

name: My New Memories: The Beginning
description: My New Memories: The Beginning tells you the story of My New Memories before you reunited with Anna and started a family. Find out how the MC turned out to be the man you know from the main game - The loving and caring husband and the protective and wonderful father!

name: A2C: Ayry Seems to be Playtesting a 2D Runner Shooter from Cci
description: A 2D runner shmup(shoot-em up) where you may or may not save a nation by beating a game. Shoot and dodge bullets while you keep running and jumping! Enjoy a story where you play the game made by Cci while Ayry and Cci banter with each other(and talk about the world of Nosolute and game development)!

name: Dumball Rush: Rainbow Pack
description: The first DLC for Dumball Rush ! Including a lot of new cosmetics to sustain the project !

name: Lucky Goal
description: Lucky goal offers an experience of a soccer game through a third-person view. Create or participate in an online match and show who is a better soccer player. A singleplayer adventure is waiting for you to improve your gaming skills.

name: The Bazaar
description: The Bazaar is the first Hero Builder, developed by Tempo. Set in a vibrant, ever-changing galactic marketplace, players assume a role from a roster of unique heroes, trading and upgrading otherworldly items & skills to assemble them into a plethora of combinations used to outplay and defeat opponents.

name: Guild Receptionist 2: Stardust Liberate
description: Become the receptionist of the guild and protect your precious daily life! This is a simulation game of a receptionist. Whether you run around to protect your village, follow the king, or expose the darkness that pervades the country, the future depends on your choice!

name: Pizza Tower: Chef's Kiss
description: Pizza Tower: Chef's Kiss is a modification to Pizza Tower aiming to bring several additions to the game, including new characters and levels. The goal is to bring an authentic DLC feeling to the mod.

name: Hunting Grounds: Whispers Of The Woods
description:
Hunting Grounds - Whispers Of The Woods is a free game aiming at letting people know about our transmedia IP named Hunting Grounds Of The Great Spirit (which will include video games, but also board games).

In this game, you have 20 minutes to find magical artifacts to give to the shaman Crazy Owl before the end of the night, so that he can perform a ceremony to get rid of the creature that haunts this dreamlike Native American universe at night.

developers.name: Hunting Grounds Of The Great Spirit

name: Alice Mesmerizing Episodes of Neurosis: AMEN
description: Alice Mesmerizing Episodes of Neurosis (AMEN) is a hidden object game. The player's task is to find things hidden on the map. Help Alice cross this path, destroy the ego-structure, get out of the abyss, find the key.

name: Persona 5: Funkin' in Starlight
description:
The Phantom Thieves have gotten another anonymous request on the Phan-Site, this time, a worried father asking that his daughter's boyfriend's heart be taken, due to his twisted desires. Doesn't seem like much trouble, so Joker takes on this request solo! Little did he expect, someone familiar to us was waiting for him...

Waiting on the shadows, the other wildcards await for a challenge in the velvet room.. The VS. Joker Full Week is here!

name: Pushover
description: this bunny is out on a trip to the city, and you're tagging along on the other end!

name: Bluejeweled
description: A mod for bejeweled 3 to add more blue

name: My Bed, Your Grave
description: Sin descripción

name: Signal Lost
description: You play as Alex, a technician dispatched for an emergency night repair at a remote radio tower deep in the woods. What starts as a simple task quickly descends into a nerve-wracking nightmare when the signal you’re fixing begins broadcasting something... unnatural.

name: Limoria
description: Welcome to a world where you are lost between consciousness and dreams. As you wander the dark corridors of an old hotel, face the games your mind plays on you. Your memories linger like a shadow following you. But there's nowhere to escape... Are you ready to confront your darkest fears?

name: A Butterfly
description:
Part horror part interactive poem about overcoming, and bittersweet surrender.
A Butterfly is part of a larger project, BlueSuburbia, but was released as a standalone because it's very big.

name: Zephyr
description: Zephyr is a made by Scotty in 1 week for their 2024 wiki and with some Speed of Doom influence.

name: Brisk
description: Brisk is a set of 30 maps in MBF21 format where each map was created in 24 hours by various authors.

name: Gaia Aura
description: Originally made for the "Vanity" community project but has now been released as a standalone map by Ar_e_en.

name: Ozonia 2
description: Ozonia 2 is the sequel to the former 2022 wad Ozonia. The megawad follows a similar philosophy from the first Ozonia by containing fairly short maps with plutonish rocket-based gameplay, non-linear navigation and cryptic lore-based narrative.

name: Tower Wizard
description: Help a wizard construct the mightiest wizard tower in this short incremental game!

name: Bucket Truck VR Simulator
description: Trainees will be guided through a safe environment for learning how to control and manipulate a Bucket Truck Vehicle. You will be able to work with other trainees to learn how spotting can be helpful in the usage of the Bucket crane.

name: Christmas Store: Santa's Supermarket Simulator
description: In the "Christmas Store: Santa's Supermarket Simulator", you run a holiday store. Fill the shelves with Christmas goods, set discounts, serve customers, hire staff and decorate the shop in a wintery style. Expand your store and create the perfect place for Christmas shopping!

name: Zen Beauty
description: Beautiful women in swimsuits, a picturesque courtyard, and flashes of inspiration captured from the mind—this is an idle game that requires minimal operation. A wide variety of decorations and outfits can be purchased using points earned through idling.

name: Cursed Baby
description: The once #1 horror game on the Horror list of Itch is back! Join now and use a variety of repair tools to experience life as a handyman in a haunted house, uncover the terrifying past of this old house and face the terrifying demon baby head-on!

name: Christmas Drift: Delivery Simulator
description: Christmas Drift - Delivery Simulator Experience the ultimate holiday challenge! Drift through snowy roads, deliver gifts on time, and conquer festive obstacles in this fun, fast-paced driving simulator. Customize your vehicle, master tricky routes, and spread Christmas cheer like never before!

name: Goodbye.Monster
description: goodbye.monster is a text-based adventure game for web browsers. Travel with and care for small creatures while exploring a strange, decaying world until the inevitable end of those creatures' lives.

name: God Crafter
description: God Crafter is a casual and satisfying 3D clicker game where you, as a god, get to recreate Earth for the humans you create. Shape and design the world with your divine powers. Immerse yourself in a relaxing and rewarding gameplay experience as you build a beautiful and thriving world from scratch.

name: Untitled Instagram Easter Egg
description: An untitled game which is an Easter egg found on Instagram's Direct Messages. By touching an emoji, a screen with a single Pong-style game opens up. The player is intended to use a paddle to prevent the ball (the emoji which was clicked on) to fall below the screen). Some emojis have different behavior, changing according to the amount of points scored.

name: Not an Aim Trainer
description: A young girl escapes into new realities through video games and her art, adventuring through different aim training scenarios; she aims to be the best.

name: Delverium
description: Explore, Build, Farm, Craft and Fight in this vast procedurally generated survival adventure for up to 4 players. What you do is up to you, but the deeper you delve, the more you uncover the hidden truth. Could you be the hero to restore stability to the land and put an end to the invading "Faults"?

name: Shadowgate PD
description:
Shadowgate is one of the most well-known and beloved point-and-click adventure titles in gaming history. As one of the original titles in the popular MacVenture series that went on to be celebrated on the NES, GBC, and Nintendo 64, Shadowgate quickly endeared players with its fantastic atmospheric soundtrack, perilous locations to progress through, countless puzzles to solve, and more ways to gruesomely die than gamers previously thought possible.

Developed by Pixel Ghost, Shadowgate PD is being lovingly reimagined for the Playdate console using Pulp, a web based game making tool made by Panic.

name: NeverRage
description: NeverRage is a third-person online role-playing game, with action & tab-targeting combat that combines theme-park and open-world experiences.

name: Astralbringer: Shaded Arkarium
description: STG has reached a new frontier! 2D bullet-hell sci-fi action shooter with mouse control and multiple buttons!

name: Funko Fusion: Mega Man Pack Bundle
description: You won't feel the blues when the heroes and villains of Mega Man rock into Funko Fusion! Fight for everlasting peace as the aloof and mysterious Proto Man, or vie for world domination with the undeniable genius of Dr Wily.

name: AI Asylum
description: Immerse yourself in a realm of madness and bone-chilling terror as you step into our gripping horror adventure, meticulously crafted to send shivers down your spine. Explore a nightmarish world where each step unveils sinister secrets and heart-pounding encounters.

name: Doki Doki Brazilian Club
description: Sin descripción

name: 2024: Mosaic Retrospective
description: 2024: Mosaic Retrospective is a charity-fundraising picross/minesweeper hybrid featuring a single ENORMOUS puzzle inspired by global news stories from throughout the year.

name: Journey to die
description:
This is a Japanese visual novel produced by MUGnet.
And this is their first work.

name: Covemachine
description: We're still returning back to normal after Covermount, we didn't finish the installation on these Covemonties. Help

name: The Lost Tetekoa
description: The Lost Tetekoa is set in the world of Ärta, a fictional world with Industrial fantasy elements, like magic with firearms. The map is somewhat a spiritual successor to Angmngthoo, one of fai1025 previous maps that goes with the same visual style of Eco-Brutalism.

name: Bearricade
description: Bearricade is a 32-map Vanilla Limit-removing megawad for Doom 2. It is a megawad of speedmaps and maps (or fragments) that were previously scrapped or abandoned by Death Bear.

name: Pokémon HGSS: Sevii Islands
description: Pokémon HeartGold & SoulSilver: Sevii Islands is a Pokémon Fan Game created by PurpleZaffre using RPG Maker XP and Pokémon Essentials v16.2.

name: Infinity Nikki: Shooting Star Season
description:
Infinity Nikki‘s first major update, “Shooting Star Season,” available December 30 through January 23, introduces new storylines, platforming challenges, time-limited events, and of course, stunning outfits to ring in the new year.

During the Shooting Star Season, shimmering meteors will grace the night skies over Miraland as residents come together and cast their wishes upon the stars. Beyond these cosmic travelers and festive decorations, players will find a series of new activities, rewards, and ways to interact with the cozy open-world.

name: Protory Jigen
description: 3D x 2D action with multiple shifting game genres! What awaits you after crossing the worlds?

name: Paath-Z
description: PAATH-Z is an intense third-person shooter blending tactical combat and survival horror. Play as a PHANTOM operative Dominic 'Shadow' Kane, infiltrating a secretive island to uncover dark experiments, battle mutated creatures, and dismantle a shadowy corporate conspiracy threatening humanity.

name: Victoria: La Primera
description: Immerse yourself in the world of the nao Victoria, a ship with its own spirit and personality that historically sailed around the world for the first time. Explore mysterious places by point-and-click and face challenges that will test your wits.

name: Toy Titan: Protector of Childhood Dreams
description: In a faraway realm, the benevolent Eldritch Crafters have entrusted you with a powerful artifact: the Dreamcore. This enchanted relic safeguards the vibrant fantasies and imaginations of children across the globe. However, the world is threatened by the malevolent sorcerer, Nythros, who desires to shatter the Dreamcore and plunge everything into a bleak, dreamless void.

name: Conscience
description: Jack Beckham is found dead, hanging in his apartment alone. Police rule it a suicide. His father, refusing to accept the conclusion, hires you to investigate. Delve into the clues left behind in his apartment to discover what really happened.

name: Isekai Saga: Awaken
description: In the Isekai world, adventure never stops! Place upgrades, heroes break through levels! Flexible strategies, multiple gameplay, simple operations, rich experience!

name: Morningtide Motel
description: Your motel is busy for the first time in years. Antsy city-folk and dispossessed teens flood your rooms, and you can barely keep up. Now, after a week of all-nighters spent managing reservations, room service requests, and Yup! reviews, you begin to wonder… could you even fall asleep if you tried?

name: Pikmin²
description: Play through a full recreation of the original Pikmin game in the engine of it's sequel, along with a whole randomizer, a whole second story featuring Louie, and much more! Fully playable alone or with a friend!

name: Misericorde Volume Two: White Wool and Snow
description:
Sister Hedwig is having a bad time.

It wasn't long ago that the Mother Superior dragged her out of her cell, forcing Hedwig to break her oath to God as an Anchoress and face the outside world. Acting as a spy for the leader of Linbarrow Abbey, Hedwig was given one seemingly simple task: Discover who really murdered Sister Catherine.

Hedwig has tried her best, but she is no closer to solving the mystery. Things just keep getting more and more complicated: Why can't any of the Sisters give her a straight answer about what happened the night of the murder? Who--or what--is the mysterious figure that haunts the abbey? And just who was Sister Catherine?

In White Wool & Snow, Sister Hedwig must steel herself. Time is running out, and so is sympathy for her situation. It's understandable that being thrust into the waking world after a life of quiet reflection as an anchoress would require some adjustment, but if Hedwig wants to save an innocent man she will have to get serious fast. Additionally, the theme song is sung by Kanako Itou, who is known for her work on the theme songs for Higurashi When They Cry: Kizuna and STEINS;GATE. With its mysterious vibe and fast pace, paired with Kanako Itou’s vocals, the song is a key constructor of the game’s atmosphere.

description: Diverse Defenders is a strategy game that combines Roguelike and Go elements. Here, you will be able to recruit characters with unique skills and form a powerful hero army. Go deep into various levels and defeat powerful bosses to achieve ultimate victory!

name: Amazing Curves Racing
description: Amazing Curves Racing: the simple, fast, and efficient racing simulator, where you start or join a race in seconds. The online multiplayer physics engine hides lag well and the tire model works directly on cubic 3D surfaces, for a high-speed racing experience not available anywhere else.

name: Delivery Mayhem
description: Race against time, embrace chaos, and become the ultimate delivery daredevil in "Delivery Mayhem." Top-down mayhem meets high-speed action!

name: Accurate Adjacent Ballistics Simulator
description: A.A.B.S. Accurate Adjacent Ballistics Simulator The Most Advanced Ballistic Damage Detection/Application System In Virtual Reality.

name: Grove Fisher
description: A relaxing idle game about fishing. Discover dozens of fishes and treasures! Spend your resources on growing your operation and unlocking new varieties of underground life! Achieve goals, buy skills, and mutate rare fish to improve your profits!

name: Hentai Uni 3
description: Sin descripción

name: High School Love: A Visual Novel Romance
description: Meet Lana in this visual novel, a shy and dreamy girl who meets Leo in the school library, a boy passionate about music, who is looking for a quiet place to play his guitar.

name: The Ghost Treasure
description: Use your soul as a stake to gamble for a treasure of the undead captain. As long as you take the randomly distributed flintlock gun and fight a duel with the ghost pirates, you can leave with the treasure, or your soul will remain on the undead ship forever. Good luck.

name: Gar-Type
description:
GORESTAR, the living planet, is on a direct course for Earth.
It's time to debut our secret weapon duo:
Ace pilot Jon Starbuckle, and his prototype starfighter, Gar-Type D.
Your mission: save humanity! Defend the Earth from the alien invaders!

name: Tonya The Killer
description: Tonya the Killer offers a fast-paced action and strategy-filled survival adventure. With dynamic enemy battles, an immersive story, and addictive gameplay, every moment is packed with excitement. Step into Tonya's world and conquer the chaos!

name: Final Sanctuary
description: A year after the disaster, the bunker's life support systems fail critically. Communication with the outside world is completely lost. You are a mechanical engineer, awakened in your quarters by a piercing siren, alone and cut off from the world.

name: The Dark Gift
description:
You woke up in the basement of your home and don’t remember anything...

When you go up to the house, you see the Christmas decorations and garlands and remember that it is family holiday time and time to get ready for it, while your wife and son went out to the store to do some shopping...

Suddenly the doorbell sounded. Opening the door, you see that someone left you a gift box...

What's inside this mysterious box?!

name: Deck the Underhalls
description: 34 festive Underhalls tributes in MBF21 format. Explore endless underground tunnels, collect more super shotguns than you'll ever know what to do with﻿, an﻿d marve﻿l at the shotgunners stuck in ﻿the walls!﻿

name: Island of Despair
description: An episode 3 replacement for Heretic to celebrate its 30th anniversary.

name: Guardian Grids
description: A pixel tower defense game packed with strategy and fun! Build Archer Towers, Magic Towers, Poison Traps, and Cannons to defend your castle from waves of monsters. With diverse levels, random cards, and upgrades, every battle feels fresh. Ready to defend? Begin your journey now!

name: Schape Dodger
description: Enjoy a casual color and shape matching game. Easy to pick up but hard to master and complete all the challenges.

name: Poop on Red
description: Take the wind! Avoid the buildings! Chasing the red car! Poop! Poop!

name: Date Banger
description: Date Banger is an exhilarating 3D adult dating game where you meet stunning girls by swiping through videos. Engage in rhythm games and fun activities to charm and win over a variety of beautiful girls. Dive into a world of pleasure, unforgettable moments.

name: Trouble in Warsaw
description: Trouble in Warsaw is a short, detective game, combining the genres of Visual Novel and Point&Click, featuring many puzzles, dialogues and related choices solidifying the plot and its finale.

name: Pragmatics
description: This is a classic match-3 puzzle game where the primary elements are colorful and uniquely shaped blocks.

name: Dicey Tales
description: Roll the dice in your hand! Dicey Tales, a TRPG-inspired game, combines deckbuilding with strategy in a unique SRPG experience. Assemble the ultimate expedition team with a variety of heroes. Defeat powerful bosses through strategic decisions and a bit of luck!

name: 100% Wedding Mission: Love Love Christmas
description: 100% Wedding Mission! is a real time strategy game playable only for a streamer with 45~ viewers. Gather gold and upgrade chat viewer's Unit! Collaborate with chat and streamers to capture the Love

name: Chirashiiru
description: A puzzle game where you have to follow the arranged themes.

name: My Life: Zoo Vet
description: Take care of sick zoo animals!

name: Untravelled Planet
description: Outer space 3D-platformer action.

name: Use Your Words 2
description:
“The party game for funny people and their unfunny friends” is back!

The cult hit Use Your Words has all-new prompts and twice as many mini-games where you compete to write the funniest punchline – we set ‘em up, and you knock ‘em down! Players can use their phones or tablets as controllers, so it’s easy to jump in and seamless to play. And if you can’t think of a punchline, you can use one of our sneaky "Decoy” answers to lay a trap for your opponents… all with beautiful new visuals by artist Andrew Kolb!

name: FallNation Lost Stories
description: A Roguelike FPS full of action and exploration, where as an ARF agent, you must face the situations that arise during critical events in Kamau. Discover what happened in the bunker SH-301, overcome the risks, and activate the Fallnation protocol before it is too late.

name: Ascend Factory
description: Welcome to Ascend Factory, a factory simulation game that challenges your ingenuity and resource management skills. Immerse yourself in a world of automation and strategic planning as you progress through levels of increasing complexity!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: In Real Time
description: You work the nightshift at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza looking out for the animatronics, now moving towards you in real time. Relive FNAF 1 with a moving animatronics camera system; but as we all know, the animatronics tend to wander a bit.

name: Welcome To Eden
description: Welcome To Eden is a narrative driven adventure RPG set in a utopian city, Eden. Take on quests to help your fellow residents, while learning about the more secretive side of Eden in this psychological adventure. And maybe, just maybe, everything isn't as it seems...

name: Mikoshi
description: Twelve levels of dynamic platforming with interesting story, charismatic main character and his friends, ability improvements, epic boss battles, secrets hidden throughout and high quality graphics.

name: The Lonely Architect
description:
The Lonely Architect is a 2D atmospheric platformer that delves into the subconscious of an overworked architect struggling with isolation. This debut game from Odaro Eguavoen, solo developer behind Ekosodi Games, started off as a demo which won a Top 25 Finalist position in the ‘Safe In Our World’ 2024 Game Jam.

Using a series of eerie spaces and landscapes, a desolate atmosphere becomes the backdrop to this minimalist game.

name: Sani Yang's Laboratory
description: Awaken in a world of furries, where your life takes an unexpected turn. After being saved by a mysterious laboratory, you’re pulled into their research on humans. But what lies beneath their seemingly noble intentions?

name: Desmond's Castle
description:
The vampire Desmond woke up from his long sleep and attacked the villagers of Burnsley.

A knight sent by the realm, will go to the vampire's dwelling to settle this matter.

From room to room, he will have to face the enemies and take the different secret passages of the castle to be able to face the terrible Desmond!

name: Journey of Johann: Grasslands
description: Sin descripción

name: Covermount
description: One of our programmers said that they wanted to express their opinion on the quality of our offices via this game. We don't understand.

name: Starship
description: An unofficial port of Star Fox 64 for PCs including enhancements.

name: Tales Beyond The Tomb: The Farm's Secret
description:
"Tales Beyond The Tomb" is a chilling episodic horror series that plunges players into the shadows of real-life cases.

This is the second episode of the series:

Episode 2: The Farm's Secret
Dragged into a web of secrets and lies, Samantha seems to be part of a puzzle impossible to solve. What once seemed obvious soon turns into something far more sinister, and the line between villain and victim begins to blur.

Nothing is as it seems. How far will you go to uncover the truth?

name: Kandinhale
description: Kandinhale is a story-driven short RPG game in which you'll have to escape from the clutches of Kandinhale, the company that owns almost the entire consumable market in this idyllic candy world.

name: Atropos
description: "Atropos" is a visual novel in which you will learn about the story of Atropos, the prince of Capernaum.

name: ­Into the Deep Dark Green Sleep
description: A story woven with the sound of rain, poetic text, and gentle narration... A short visual novel where you can spend a relaxing moment in your own place, with time to yourself, where no one will disturb you, no one will come barging in. It could be a small, secretive café.

name: Keep it Up
description: A thrilling rock climbing puzzle action game with simple click challenges

name: J-Room
description: J-Room is a turn-based strategy probability game. Playable only with the mouse. Manipulate your opponent's action probabilities with cards. Swords are strong against guns, guns are strong against helmets, helmets are strong against swords. An eerie world set in old Japan. Escape from J-Room.

name: Cheese Party
description: Cheese Party is a casual match 3 game where you match charcuterie board delights to complete party orders with cute artwork. Create cheese knife specials and rainbow cheese if you match more. High point scores are rewarded with power ups to cheese the levels.

name: Shelf Life
description: Shelf Life is an action FPS set in a near future conglomerate, that will seem eerily familiar if you spend your time around online dumpster fires. Use your arsenal of weapons to shoot, burn and fungible-ize your way through the Edison facility fighting a lizardy hostile takeover.

name: Ping Pong Deluxe
description: Ping Pong Deluxe immerses you in a world of table tennis that revolutionizes the classic game with new modes and different maps! Here you get fast-paced rallies and dynamic gameplay that will keep you enthralled. Become the undisputed table tennis champion!

name: Anima Fighters
description: Fight to escape from the dimensional prison: choose one of the six warriors and prepare for battle.

name: MasterChef: Learn to Cook! - Christmas Special
description: Christmas is here! Roll up your sleeves and cook up a holiday feast worthy of a number one chef!

name: Outbreak: Take a Bite Collection
description: Experience the best retro survival horror nightmares the Outbreak series has to offer at a deep bundled discount.

name: General Warfare
description: Sin descripción

name: House Painting: Simulator
description: Enjoy the most realistic and fun house painting simulator you’ve ever seen!

name: Zombies and Orcs
description: You have discovered ways to quickly move using teleportation and when visiting new lands you will have to protect your portals so that aggressors do not penetrate them.

name: Pickle Invasion
description: Sin descripción

name: Scramble Animal Words
description: Sin descripción

name: Bilge Junction
description:
Welcome to Bilge Junction, population 8: a dying town on the arctic highway. With the promise of a cheap roof over your head, you ran from your problems and wound up here.

But winter's setting in, and the fire keeps burning. A storm is on its way. There's something lurking in the pipeline that built the town. In three days' time, it's bound to escape.

name: Sub Terra Draconis: The Golemworks
description: A dusty tunnel to the side leads to an old dwarven construction facility. Disused parts of golems and other machinery litter the ground. There is surely treasure here, but these tunnels won't lead him to the outside of the mountain!

name: Cognitive Dissonance: A SiIvaGunner Christmas Comeback Crisis Side Story
description: Cognitive Dissonance: A SiIvaGunner Christmas Comeback Crisis Side Story is a visual novel and spinoff of the SiIvaGunner Christmas Comeback Crisis which was released as a part of the SiIvaGunner 2024 Christmas ARG. The game follows The Joke-Explainer 7000 as she helps Dr. Andonuts with his mental struggles.

name: Clinical Trial
description: A suspense tale about signing up to test psychiatric drugs for money and provider-patient relations.

name: Rusty Drill
description: Rusty Drill is a 32 map community megawad which began development back in 2023 to celebrate Scythe turning 20. ﻿This project was a continuation of the Scythe themed community project "Scythe: Re-sharpened" by EPICALL.

name: Famulus
description: Famulus is a short retro-style shoot-em-up-and-down adventure game about kebabs made by me (programming, sounds, graphics) in about 2 weeks for Sewer Jam 5.

name: Dreams of Saturn 2.0
description:
This brand-new edition of Dreams of Saturn features an entirely new chapter that takes Ryo to Yokosuka Harbor for another fun-filled Christmas story! Packed with SEGA references and Easter eggs, including the legendary Segata Sanshiro, and follow the tale of Santa Maeno as he embarks on a mission to save Christmas for the residents of Yokosuka!

This release includes both Dreams of Saturn 1 and 2.0 as one full game, allowing you to select a starting point depending on if you are playing the entire game fresh or for the first time, or already experienced Dreams of Saturn 1 and wanted to jump straight ahead to the 2nd chapter.

name: Promized Land: Outer Town
description: PL:OT 2025 is a third-person shooter horror survival simulator where you will experience terror while exploring an infected city, alone or with your closest person.

name: ODouzy!!!
description: In ODouzy!!!, guide a cute rectangle through colorful levels, dodging bomb traps and collecting beans and douzy. With a blend of simple movement mechanics and challenging puzzles, navigate vibrant worlds and gather enough the douzy to emerge victorious in this lighthearted, strategic adventure!

name: Float Survival Simulator: Ocean Survivor
description: Survive the waves, outsmart the predators.

name: Block Jam
description: Plan, match, and clear the board in Block Jam, where every move counts and every block needs the perfect match!

name: Art Detective: Hidden in Gusu
description: Step into the vibrant world of Qing Dynasty Suzhou with Art Detective’s latest chapter. Discover over 400 hidden objects as you unravel secrets and immerse yourself in a stress-free, artful adventure.

name: Mint's Hints 2
description: Step back onto the set of Mint's Hints, a cancelled children's TV show you were once the showrunner for. What begins as a curious exploration soon turns into a nightmare as you're hunted by the vengeful spirits that roam the abandoned set. Seeking refuge in an underground corridor, you stumble upon an android version of Mint, the show's once-beloved star, now deactivated and discarded.

name: Ommatophilia
description:
Ommatophilia is a surreal horror game in development about angels. You play as the Angel Cakes, a girl trying her very best to be happy with her friends despite her circumstances.

Explore the world of Ithal with your companions as you prepare to say farewell to Blue, an angel who will soon undertake Departure. Talk to several angels, solve puzzles, and meet those who do not have faces.

Come to Ithal, dear player! Embrace the eyes. Learn to say goodbye!

name: Autos
description: Autos is driving game contains five modes Racing, Car Park Drift, Truck Challenge, Rally and Transportation Open World Driving.

name: Phoenix Reborn Games Big Christmas bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Hand-Drawn Epic Adventures
description: Two big adventures with memorable characters!

name: Ancient Ants Adventure
description: Your task is to become the leader of this great colony, rebuild your army and learn to use magic to protect your comrades in order to turn the tide of battle with terrible enemies.

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Egypt
description: Graphic novel about the adventures of a young traveling architect. Discover Bimfli and his friends in this beautiful story full of values and lessons.

name: Fighter Aces: Sky Dominance
description: Your Sky, Your Rules: Experience the Ultimate Aerial Combat!

name: Grass Life Sim
description: Grass Life Sim is a game in which you can become grass.

name: That New Diner
description: That New Diner is a short murdersim visual novel for Android, Linux, Mac and Windows.

name: Frosted Love
description: A short visual novel featuring Dizzy Dokuro, Kaneko Lumi, Hoshiumi Jelly and Ember Amane from the VTuber agency Phase-Connect.

name: SilvaGunner: Rebooted
description: SilvaGunner: Rebooted is an Undertale fangame released by SiIvaGunner as a part of the Christmas 2024 ARG, in which it plays in the genocide ending of the SilvaGunner: Rebooted storyline. The player plays as Chad Warden as he faces off against Haruka Amami.

name: Czech Soccer Manager 2025
description: Czech Soccer Manager is a football manager simulator, where you take over the coaching of one of the available teams and try to bring it not only by using reinforcements to bring over time to success.

name: AAA Dynamic Scenes
description: AAA Dynamic Scenes allows you to transform your screen into a device that grants you power of surveying space and time. Immerse yourself in beautifully animated vistas from the farthest reaches of the universe - feast your eyes on the many futures and pasts from the great beyond. The application can also function as a screen saver displaying date and time over the scapes and at a touch of a button can turn each scene into a jigsaw puzzle providing you with entertainment. This product contains five scapes - your experience can be expanded by purchasing additional 35 vistas - please see available packs in items related to this product.

name: Finally A NSMB2 Christmas Mod
description:
The first ever Christmas themed mod for New Super Mario Bros. 2!

This mod includes:
~ Brand New Levels with a Christmas theme!
~ Brand new and familiar festive graphics!
~ Tons of remodeled enemies and objects to fit the Christmas theme!
~ Custom Snow themed Worldmap!
~ A Soundtrack made up of many game franchises!
~ And much much more!!!

name: Dead Christmas
description: Step into the boots of Santa Claus himself, facing a nightmare like no other. A peaceful North Pole is thrown into disarray when an alien spacecraft crashes near Santa's village, unleashing a deadly virus that infects his loyal elves.

name: Wordlike
description: A word roguelike. Make words, tune your bag of letters, and collect power-ups to beat increasingly difficult levels.

name: Ginger's Letter to Santa
description: "This is it! This year I will cook the best roast Christmas dinner the Zodiacs has ever seen! They will all scream for more and then nobody will try to eat me, no more no more!" Join Ginger, Sullyvan, and the Gonk on this RPG Christmas Adventure as they deliver their letters to Santa's Factory!

name: A War On Christmas 3: World War C
description: The third installment in the "A War on Christmas Series" featuring 12 maps of Christmas Mania.

name: Madness Below
description: Madness Below is a RPG dark fantasy horror game developed by Sif Kamira that began development in November 2024.

name: Baptisterio
description: With an analog camera, a gift from my father, a photo of the missing tourists and the illusion of my first big news I prepare to enter with the brothers to the enigmatic baptistery.

name: Oryum
description:
Step into the immersive world of Oryum, a reimagined game where tradition meets innovation. Designed for hardcore grinders and dungeon enthusiasts, Oryum offers balanced mechanics, continuous quest series, and bug-free gameplay that redefine the MMORPG experience.

Engage in thrilling events, tackle challenging dungeons, and explore a meticulously crafted world brought to life by a professional development team. With flashy cosmetics, unique boosters, and a focus on community-driven updates, Oryum delivers a seamless blend of classic MMORPG nostalgia and modern enhancements.

Whether you're conquering epic bosses or building your legacy in the vibrant in-game economy, Oryum promises an unforgettable adventure tailored for veterans and newcomers alike. Join now and forge your story in a world that never stops evolving.

name: Real Pharmacy Simulator
description: Become the owner of a pharmacy in Real Pharmacy Simulator! Manage the business, serve customers, and balance profit with ethics. Order medicines, organize the space, and decide how to run your business - honestly or riskily. Your decisions will determine the fate of the pharmacy!

name: Propa.
description: In this RTS game, control your virus to replicate and evolve against a powerful immune system. Equip gene segments to create unique viral armies. Use tactics to eliminate immune cells or achieve escape. Develop strategies for domination and enjoy endless strategic fun!

name: Guns, Blocks, and Steel
description: A voxel-based multiplayer FPS with fully destructible terrain and an emphasis on strategy, tactics, and resource management. Play singleplayer with bots or multiplayer PVP/co-op.

name: All About Maze
description: A casual, retro, Atari-inspired maze traversing game. Controllers recommended! Play by yourself or couch-coop with your friends and family.

name: Penguin Escape
description: Penguin Escape is a fun and challenging game to play, simply collect all the items in order to move to the next phase, just do not get caught, use portals and platforms for your advantage

name: Hentai World Halloween
description: This is a captivating game featuring stunning and charming girls. Immerse yourself in the jigsaw puzzle mechanics, arranging pieces to reveal the full picture of these eye-catching characters.

name: Ad Astra: Sci-Fi Tower Defense
description: Lose yourself in an indie solo-dev. treasure that harkens back to arcade classics! All while thumping along to killer retro-inspired beats by Ovani sound. Embark on an epic tower defense adventure against awe-inspiring machine monstrosities, made by a devoted gamer for devoted gamers.

name: Grand Mall Simulator
description: Manage and expand your own shopping mall in Grand Mall Simulator! Open diverse boutiques, stock shelves, decorate, and attract customers to grow your profits. Hire workers for automation and create a unique mall experience. Can you turn your center into a bustling mall?

name: 5 Nights at Timokha's 4 School
description: Continuation of the legendary saga about the naughty Timokha and his delicious pie!

name: Coffee Break
description: It's time for a well-deserved break from your space-engineering stuff. Unravel the functioning of your freshly repaired coffee machine, while trying not to destroy the Earth. The fate of all humanity lies on your mug!

name: Combat Rally
description: Gear up for mayhem! Combat Rally combines real car physics with explosive battles. Outrace and outgun your friends on thrilling tracks using a deadly arsenal. With local and online multiplayer, it's the ultimate party game. Think fast, drive hard, and dominate the rally—your gears, your rules!

name: Monoquous 2
description: A challenging puzzle platformer in which you can phase through walls to invert the world around you, taking the direction of gravity with it - up becomes down, black becomes white, and deadly obstacles lose and gain their threat along the way.

name: The Battle for Christmas
description: The Battle for Christmas is a festive platformer where you play as Santa, battling goblins who stole Christmas presents. Explore 30 levels, face 3 epic bosses, and enjoy charming graphics in this fun adventure to save the holiday season!

name: Hideko
description:
Hideko is a short mystery game about nature.

Explore the rules of a small sandbox world to create new objects, plants and other forms of life! Discover special situations and interactions to earn stars to increase your inventory-size and unlock new areas.

name: Stella Gladio
description: A precision platformer where you take on the role of Gladio, venturing into a mysterious magical tower with your companion—a sentient, talking sword "Stella".

name: ParallHex
description: ParallHex is a puzzle game where you'll navigate increasingly challenging levels. Solve puzzles simultaneously in two distinct worlds, interconnected by your every move.

name: Paper Bride 6: Nightmare
description: "Paper Bride 6 Nightmare” is the sixth work to the Paper Bride series. Dive into a bewitching dream and immerse yourself in yet another immersive Chinese horror puzzle game!

name: Superhero Market
description: Become the manager of a dynamic supermarket! Manage inventory, optimize store design, plan shelves and improve the customer experience. In this immersive management game, every decision counts to develop your business and satisfy your customers. Are you ready to take on the challenge?

name: Seedbo And That Time The Sun Exploded
description: Re-assemble the sun in this bite-sized adventure platformer!

name: Christmas Gift Catcher
description: From the makers of The Jumping Food Games comes the perfect game for the holidays: "Christmas Gift Catcher"! After decorating the Christmas tree in our previous game, "Christmas Tree Decorating Simulator", now it's time to collect the presents.

name: OFC: Ultimate Fighting Club
description: OFC - ULTIMATE FIGHTING CLUB invites you to dive into the brutal world of no-holds-barred fighting, where the only rule is to win. Join a fighting club inspired by the intense atmosphere of real OFC tournaments, and level up your fighter to become a true champion.

name: Die for the Economy!
description: Blast evil robots in a retro psychedelic maze of an office, as you bring down the security servers and make your way home. Die for the Economy! is a retro arcade survival game featuring beautiful, chunky pixel art graphics with a psychedelic slant harking back to the old 8-bit game systems.

name: Jump Race
description: Jump high. Run fast. Win the race!

name: Morkull: Ragast's Rage - Collector's Edition
description:
A 2D video game that combines platforming and action with a touch of exploration in which we control Morkull, God of death and darkness and lord of the Ragast, whose main mechanics lies in the breaking of the fourth wall, which will allow Morkull to communicate with the player in various ways.
The Collector's Edition contains:
• The Base Game (Standard Edition)
• Special Box with exclusive illustration
• An Artbook
• 4 stickers
• Postcards Set
• Original soundtrack on CD-ROM

name: Lost Room: Escape
description: As twilight descends and the world plunges into darkness, you, a seasoned police officer, find yourself answering a harrowing call that shatters the peace of a quiet, unassuming neighborhood. The distressed voice on the other end speaks of Lost Apartment, a place steeped in sinister legends.

name: Ghoulie's Garden
description: Welcome to Ghoulie’s Garden, where Halloween magic awaits!

name: Ways
description: A lone urbex in an abandoned hotel - what could go wrong? Explore the surroundings and find the mysteries of this place. Don't forget to be quiet - urbex is an illegal adventure, and you don't want to be found...

name: High Score
description: High Score is a thrilling top-down arena shooter where you face off against relentless waves of numerical enemies. Rack up points and earn medals to unlock a variety of unique classes and powerful items. Dive into the action, enhance your arsenal, and aim for the highest score!

name: Mary
description: Mary is a mystery and investigation game, in which you are a private detective who has been called to solve a case of a massacre in a bar. Collect all the clues and find an answer to all the mysteries of this case!

name: Holy Undead
description: An undead-loving necromancer is reincarnated as a saint!? By chance, the necromancer Frankel is reborn as Yurishia, a girl with the incredible qualities of a saint. Today, too, she ignores the expectations of those around her and forges ahead on her path to collecting undead.

name: Wallsurf
description: Wallsurf is a game that combines elements from CS:GO's Surf minigame, Jumps, and the beta release of Karlson. This game is a fast paced 3D racer based on the movement mechanic of sliding down walls.

name: Ragdoll Training Center
description:
Ragdoll Training Center is a physics based arcade game where you push a ragdoll character through the challenging maps to reach the finish.
Compete for thousandths of a second differences with other players in global ranking.
Create your own maps in Map Editor and try maps made by other players.

name: Dashpunch
description: After the Tyrant Hand is stolen by a mysterious figure, an ancient being awakens to return it to its rightful place before it's too late. Dash and Punch your way through corrupted dungeons that fall apart at the seams, meet colorful characters, battle powerful bosses and carve your legacy!

name: Forgotten Fears
description: Forgotten Fears is a collection of five small horror games, ranging from rainy forest to deep underwater.

name: Empire: Sound of the North
description: Empire: Sound of the North, a swipe em up cards game. Swipe the cards, go on adventures, solve puzzles and mysteries, make everyone happy and create your own kingdom.

name: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite & Beyond
description: A mod conversion of MVC:I that overhauls the functionality, art, and playstyle of general characters in the game, including the addition of a new 4-player, 2v2 mode where all 4 characters actively fight on-screen at the same time.

name: Lost Days 0: Queen's Dream
description: Lost Days 0: Queen's Dream is a Sci-Fi visual novel for the Sega Saturn about Io, a pilot/spy who was sent to United Europe to investigate Cornelli, meanwhile, the arrival of a skilled assassin threatens her mission.

name: The Mare of Jonah
description: A first-person psychological horror/mystery adventure where you play as a small boy trapped in an unknown and dark mansion. Try to survive the vengeful evil spirits lurking in the dark while exploring the rooms and corridors in hopes of finding clues that may lead to a way out of this horror.

name: Marble Maid 2: The Negative Levels
description: Deep in the damp dungeons of a forgotten mansion, evil lurks. A sexy maid is ready to cause chaos!

name: Street Race Kings
description: You are brought into a racing league, the SRK. Once you can qualify and prove yourself to the league, you then make your way to the top, racing against various competitors, and taking down stage bosses to move up in rank! Multiple vehicles, customization, open world maps, and more!

name: Bone Meal
description: Plant strange mutated crop in a chilling rogue-like with strategic resource management. Use a wide variety of seeds through three seasons to survive the blinding glow of the sun. Brew tonics, produce biofuel, upgrade facilities, and don't go hungry.

name: Echoes of the Abyss
description: Dive into a rogue-lite survivor action game, where world changes based on your Sanity. Eat or be eaten. Grow from Prey into Hunter. Build ability-combos to survive waves of creatures from the Abyss. Uncover secrets of your lost humanity.

name: Ultimate General: American Revolution
description: American Revolution is a sandbox strategy game featuring the epic historical period during the rebellion of the American colonies against the British Empire. Take on the role of the British or American Colonists, and fight for territorial control over North America. A gripping real-time campaign awaits you on a detailed 3d map where you can build your army and navy, construct military infrastructure, and fully command your armies on a regimental level. If you want even more action you can fully zoom-in and fight massive battles on a battalion level.

name: MannaRites Gold
description: Gold edition of the warmly received fantasy 2.5D hack-n-slash / RPG - MannaRites! Cut your way through enemy troops, explore open map, find and equip legendary weapons, armor and artifacts, level up your hero! Defend your lands from invaders!

name: War to the Core
description: War to the Core is a tactical multiplayer war game where fleets of motherships battle for global domination.

name: Poveglia: The Island of Non Return
description: Visit one of the darkest places in Italy where hundreds of souls were forgotten in time. After an acclaimed career as a private investigator, detective William Miller takes on one last case; the disappearance of the Family Pierangelli, which has remained in mystery for over thirty years.

name: It is a Good Knight to Die
description: Fight your way through hordes of evil in this light-hearted 2D, action-platformer. Traverse and battle your way through deep caves, werewolf filled forests, frigid peaks, and big stompy bosses! Always remember, It Is A Good Knight To Die!

name: Locked In Mind
description: In Locked in Mind, you are trapped in a virtual escape room full of puzzles. Use your wits to solve them at your own pace without the pressure of a time limit. Perfect for players of all skill levels. Start your adventure today!

name: Vincemus: Air Combat
description: Fly through the theaters of World War II with fighters planes from across the world. Intercept, Raid, Defend, Survive in theatres of World War II. Vincemus is an arcade semi-realistic air combat shooter, The game is avalable on WindowsOS and MacOS.

description: Are you ready for a new adventure? Fasten your seatbelt and experience what it's like to be a pilot as you dive into the most breathtaking landscapes of this planet.

name: Christmas Puzzle Story
description: Celebrate the magic of the holiday season with Christmas Puzzle Story, a cozy and addictive puzzle game where festive fruits and Christmas treats collide in delightful combos!

name: Christmas Stories: The Adventures of Santa Claus
description: Visual novels full of magic, snow and exploration where players immerse themselves in the wonderful world of the North Pole.

description:
Team up with friends for epic co-op battles.
Jump, kick, and unleash special moves.
Score big and become the ultimate champion!

name: Item Frenzy
description: Experience the Joy of Discovery in Item Frenzy!

name: Little Animals: The Wild Race
description: Interactive graphic novel that tells the exciting adventures of three adorable animal friends who participate in a daring race through the jungle.

description: The dream home starts here: paint, listen, relax.
