description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Taxi Driver Simulation 2025
description: Speed, stunts, and passengers—master the urban chaos!

name: Desierto
description: This is a game about getting lost.

name: Heads Will Roll: Reforged - Threads of Destiny
description:
• French Campaign
Switch sides and swear allegiance to the French king, continuing your military career under a new banner - that of kingdom of France. Go on a new ambitious campaign against Paris' numerous rivals in order to, one by one, bring them all to submission, earning wealth and glory in the process. But don't let the glitter of gold blind you as, in the royal service, the cloaks and daggers of maligners and ill-wishers might prove to be way more dangerous than even the sharpest swords and spears of the best enemy knights.

• Bounty Hunting
Accept the offer of Grace & Glory and abandon the military career in favour of bounty hunting. Accompany your new colleagues on their travels around medieval Europe and complete various contracts, some of which might take you to rather unexpected places. They say that bounty hunters die young — find out if you got what it takes to become an exception from this rule.

• From a peasant to a king
Betrayal is the worst possible sin. However is it really that bad if the crown of the whole kingdom is at stake? Stop being a pawn in somebody else's game and make your own dash for the throne. Seizing the crown will be a challenging task, holding onto it will be even harder. But, if you've got a true monarch's ambition, the battle is worth the blood. True greatness is now within your reach — it's time to become the king or die trying!

name: Arena Breakout: Season 7 – Secured Gear No Fear
description:
Arena Breakout is available for download worldwide with the new Season 7 update, ""SECURED GEAR, NO FEAR"". Download and enjoy the latest shooter with tens of millions of players around the world! Eliminate adversaries head-on, with stealth, or bypass the bullets altogether. Players have the freedom to fight however they desire. Escape the combat area alive for a chance to strike it rich, but be prepared to fight for survival.
Please note that your feedback will be processed by the Arena Breakout team for improving the game, responding to you, and/or providing support and troubleshooting, such as addressing and remediating technical issues and bugs.

name: Tsumi no Hikari Rendez-vous
description: Sin descripción

name: Wanted?
description: It's not often that you look closely at the faces of people you pass on the street, is it? It's no wonder that there are people near you who look exactly like the ones on the wanted list .This game will test your observational skills.

name: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 2 (Holiday Special)
description: Step into the next chapter of To the Moon with Sigmund Minisode 2, a poignant holiday-themed spin-off that offers a deeper look at the lives of Dr. Eva Rosalene and Dr. Neil Watts. This part continues to explore the personal struggles, mysterious secrets, and ethical dilemmas faced by the doctors of Sigmund Corporation.

name: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 1 (Holiday Special)
description: Return to the world of To the Moon in this heartfelt spin-off that dives deeper into the lives of Dr. Eva Rosalene and Dr. Neil Watts. During a holiday season filled with both festive cheer and public protests against the Sigmund Corporation, this minisode explores the ethical dilemmas and emotional challenges behind their wish-fulfillment work.

name: Level
description:
Somehow you are locked in a strange room.
Find the hidden items and solve the riddle to escape.

name: Puniru ha Kawaii Slime no Game wo "Ano Game" de Tsukuttemita Keredo, Hatashite Anata ha Clear Dekirunoka?
description: This game is a collection of three mini-games with 150 stages, created by D3 Publisher in collaboration with Dokokade Mita “Ano Ga ”me Tachi wo Bouningen de Tsukuttemita Keredo.

name: DJMax Respect V: V Liberty II Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Store Wars: Multiplayer Shop Simulator
description: Play solo or with up to 16 friends in a chaotic grocery store showdown! Manage, grow, and compete against rival stores in a fun, lighthearted battle of wits and strategy. Who will be the ultimate grocery tycoon? Sabotage, upgrade, and outwit your friends in this unpredictable simulator!

name: Virtual Girl: Sex Simulator VR
description: Customize every moment with over 200 body animations and 100 facial expressions. With realistic HDRP graphics and full VR support, dive into a world of passion and connection like never before. Whether on PC or in Virtual Reality, this is your chance to create your perfect experience.

name: Water Game Simulator
description: A classic casual puzzle game that simulates a water ring machine.

name: Christmas Mutilator
description: Inspired by 80s slasher films, Christmas Mutilator is an immersive horror and home invasion game. Your husband and children are trapped in the storm, you are stuck in a cabin for the holidays. Use every tactic you can to stay alive and get out of your house as a vicious psychopath breaks in.

name: Countermark Saga: The Tale of Fariz
description: "Countermark Saga: The Tale of Fariz" is an SRPG set in the medieval world of Yusia. A modern high school student is mysteriously transported to this ancient land and caught in its conflicts. Alongside a princess, they embark on a dangerous journey filled with intrigue and hidden secrets.

name: Tank Arena: Total Operation
description: Tank Arena:Total Operation is a free MMO war game where you play as a commander, drive thousands of types of tanks, armored vehicles or helicopters on a massive battlefield engaging in 12v12 team-based battles against players globally. Enjoy the fun!

name: Furry Aim Trainer: Gooning Mode
description: Edge closer to victory with gooning mode! 20 unique furry targets as well as videos to practice with!

name: Forgotten Memories
description: Forgotten Memories is an adult visual novel where your choices lead to intimate relationships and multiple outcomes. Uncover your lost memories, forge connections with three unique women, and experience both emotional and erotic storylines.

name: Gacha Addict Simulator
description: A simulator game where you play as a gacha-addicted human of society. Go to work, earn money, survive, and do what you were meant to do as a human being - play all the gacha games in the world. Gacha pulls earn you collectibles that you can place in and decorate the space of your small apartment!

name: Motorcycle Combat
description: The game is designed to drive a motorcycle and kill or destroy targets along city roads, occupying the Goal, allowing the game player to win. You need more than 100 points and 10 shields to win.

name: Castaway Hand
description: A relaxing vacation, a leisurely journey - that's how it was supposed to be, but due to a cruise ship crash, you are stranded on a tropical desert island. With its vast sandy beaches, dense woods, and possibly less dangerous animals - do you, by any chance, have what it takes to survive?

name: Gravity Block 2
description: Gravity Block 2 is a minimalist puzzle game where the player must control the environment to make the Block reach the end.

name: Sweet X'mas
description: Sweet X'mas - is a simple and beautiful puzzle game with a Christmas theme. It is accompanied by relaxing music. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photos in the gallery.

name: Fallen: Into the Darkness
description: Dive deep into the darkness in this free-to-play, single-player platformer. Time moves fast, so keep your light alive and watch your step, each attempt reshapes the entire level.

name: HuntNPrey
description: HuntNPrey is a multiplayer hide-and-seek game for up to 8 players. By day, act natural and blend in with the herd to escape the hunter's sights. By night, transform into a wolf and flip the script—now it's your turn to hunt! Stay sneaky, stay sated, or get caught!

name: Summons Sword: Pot Guardian
description: "Summons Sword: Pot Guardian" is a top-down, highly challenging action game. Teleport to dodge enemy attacks, fight with swords and summoning magic, and recover the treasure "Clay Pot of Darkness" stolen by the evil summoner!

name: TattooVR
description: TattooVR is an immersive art experience that brings the ancient art of tattooing into the cutting edge of VR. TattooVR also supports VRM-format avatars, so you can upload your favorite characters and design one-of-a-kind tattoos just for them.

name: A Few Days With: Emma
description: Embark on a sensual Christmas Baubles hunting adventure with Emma, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Emma's enticing layers.

name: Archaeology: Sand Fantasy
description: A game of the genre find the hidden object.

name: Anemone
description: This is a board game set in the fictional Japanese city of "Neverland." Enjoy local multiplayer with simple mouse-based controls. Original music and an unusual world await you

name: Planet Factory
description: A small quick game about building a factory to launch planets into a solar system! Grow your base and increase production to make the ultimate factory for launching planets!

name: Taiwan Love Story⁵
description: "Taiwan Love Story ⁵" is a romantic interactive novel. To write a thesis on love, you meet girls from different parts of Taiwan. As you conduct your academic research, you gradually become captivated by them, leading to a series of sweet, bittersweet, and complex romantic encounters.

name: Heavenly Way Legend
description: “Heavenly Way Legend” is a casual game set against the backdrop of Chinese xianxia. You will play as a cultivator, cultivating, fighting, exploring, and having fun in various spaces.

name: Prop Hunt Rumble
description: Welcome to Prop Hunt Rumble, the multiplayer hide-and-seek game where hunters use their fingers as magical projectiles and props have ingenious abilities to turn the tables! Get ready for a hilarious experience filled with strategy, bluffing, and guaranteed laughter!

name: Galaxy Hassle
description: Step into the shoes of Corelatine Rangers Ralph and Brad, as they steer their way through Asteroid Fields and Monsters a-plenty, to arrest Dr. Jillkoy - A menace known for his deadly atrocities towards intergalactic citizens. Do you have what it takes to see him behind bars?

name: Dig Night
description: Dark comical RPG set in a city at night and a spiritual world.

name: Purrgonia
description: There are many things hidden within the unexplored wilderness. Venture into a mysterious forest to gather resources so you can rebuild the village of Purrgonia. Bring back life to the forgotten lands but be wary: the illusive serenity can make you forget about the true dangers of this place.

name: Secrets In Green
description: When a pretty plant in Alma's garden begins to speak to her, she knows that a dark mystery is afoot! But in Victorian England, women are often dismissed as nothing more than hysterical fantasists. Can you help Alma find her power, and solve this dangerous situation before it's too late?

name: Ascendrix
description: The ascent nightmare

name: Starving Cat
description: Starving Cat is a third person sci-fi shooter where you explore planets and fight monsters to find food for scientist cat Simon.

name: Cryst
description: In this action-packed game, unknown creatures invade a factory and steal diamond pieces. Your mission is to play through exciting stages, recover the missing pieces of diamond scattered across various locations, and restore them to the factory.

name: Eggconsole Aqua Polis SOS MSX
description: A shooting game depicting a rescue drama set in an underwater city. Avoid obstacles and missile interference as you save the people of the underwater city!

name: Truck Simulator 25: American Driver
description: Truck Simulator 25 - American Driver invites you to an exciting adventure on the roads of America, progressing through levels set in diverse locations — from industrial zones to quiet suburbs and the bustling city center. From hauling cargo across diverse landscapes to managing your trucking business, this game brings the thrill of the road to life. Your task is to deliver goods on time, improving your driving skills and upgrading your trucks as you go.

name: Vaulting Champions
description: Try this incredible mix of track and field and running. Pole vaulting through the course is something very unusual and unrealistically fun!

name: Cats Visiting Christmas Town
description: Embark on a Christmas quest to uncover hidden cats in charming holiday scenes filled with snowmen, festive shops, and a grand tree adorned with gifts.

name: Tekken 8: Clive Rosfield
description:
Clive Rosfield, the first prince of the Grand Duchy of Rosaria, from FINAL FANTASY XVI joins the tournament!

Experience thrilling swordplay and precision coordinated attacks with Clive's loyal hound, Torgal. Wield powerful and dynamic Eikonic abilities and temporarily transform into the mighty Ifrit. Use your power as the Dominant of Fire to emerge victorious.

Content:
- Clive Rosfield as a playable character
